mapper.insert: INSERT INTO StadiumRewardSystem.Fan (first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, occupation) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{occupation})
INSERT INTO StadiumRewardSystem.Preference (fan_id, stand_id, reservation_time) VALUES (#{fanId}, #{standId}, #{reservationTime})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM StadiumRewardSystem.Fan WHERE LOWER(first_name) = LOWER(#{firstName}) AND LOWER(last_name) = LOWER(#{lastName})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM StadiumRewardSystem.Preference; DELETE FROM StadiumRewardSystem.Fan;
